description.english: Finish writing a total of 25 books. You can also publish them to get some extra money!
description.german: Schreib insgesamt 25 Bücher. Du kannst sie zusätzlich veröffentlichen, um etwas extra Geld zu verdienen!
description.french: Écrivez un total de 25 livres. Vous pouvez également les publier pour gagner de l’argent supplémentaire !
description.italian: Scrivi un totale di 25 libri. Puoi anche pubblicarli per ottenere qualche guadagno extra!
description.spanish: Termina de escribir un total de 25 libros. ¡También puedes publicarlos para conseguir algo de dinero extra!
description.dutch: Schrijf in totaal 25 boeken. Je kunt ze ook publiceren om wat extra geld te verdienen!
description.romanian: Finish writing a total of 25 books. You can also publish them to get some extra money!
description.brazilian: Escreva ao total 25 livros. Você também poderá publicar eles para ganhar algum tipo de dinheiro extra!
description.schinese: 总计创作25部书。你可以出版它们来赚取额外的收入！
description.tchinese: Finish writing a total of 25 books. You can also publish them to get some extra money!
description.polish: Napisz 25 książek. Możesz też je opublikować, by zarobić trochę pieniędzy!
description.czech: Napiš 25 knih. Můžeš je taky zkusit vydat a vydělat na nich!
description.turkish: Toplam 25 kitap yaz. Ayrıca, ek gelir elde etmek için yazdığın kitapları yayınlayabilirsin!
description.japanese: 合計25冊の本を書き終える。出版してお金を稼ぐこともできます！

description.english: Create every woodworking item at least once.

description.english: Create every food item at least once, including barbecued food and food created by children.
description.german: Koche oder grille jedes Lebensmittel mindestens einmal. Das beinhaltet auch Essen, das von Kindern gekocht werden kann.
description.french: Cuisinez tous les plats au moins une fois, y compris les grillades et les aliments créés par les enfants.
description.italian: Prepara ogni alimento almeno una volta, compreso il cibo cotto al barbecue e quello preparato dai/dalle bambin*.
description.spanish: Cocina todas las comidas al menos una vez, incluyendo comida creada por niños y barbacoa
description.dutch: Bereid elke gerecht tenminste één keer, inclusief gebarbecued eten en eten gemaakt door kinderen.
description.romanian: Create every food item at least once, including barbecued food and food created by children.
description.brazilian: Cozinhe todas as comidas pelo menos uma vez, incluindo churrasco e comida cozinhada por crianças
description.schinese: 所有类型食品至少生产出一个，包括烧烤菜肴和儿童制菜品。
description.tchinese: Create every food item at least once, including barbecued food and food created by children.
description.polish: Ugotuj wszystkie dania przynajmniej raz, włączając też grillowane jedzenie i jedzenie stworzone przez dzieci.
description.czech: Připrav alespoň jednou každý pokrm. Počítají se i grilovaná jídla a jídla, která mohou připravovat děti.
description.turkish: Her yemek ürününü bir kez bile olsa yap, çocukların yaptığı ve barbekü dahil.
description.japanese: バーベキュー料理や子供が作る料理などを含む、すべての料理アイテムを1回以上作る
